name: The Ruins of Nibiru - Galactible™ #24
description:
Holy Tomb of Anubis! Congratulations, you’ve discovered Galactible™ #24, the “Ruins of Nibiru!” Hidden within the jungles of Nibiru, the 12th planet of the Sol System, lies the ruins of an ancient civilization. The origins of all life are kept deep within its caverns and are protected by the Universal Council of Beings. The ruby gems that are found here can be collected to raise your Mana! 

Galactibles™ are one-of-a-kind and minted as 1-of-1. Only 99 will be made! New Galactibles™ drop every week (sorta) on twitter, so give us a follow @Galactibles! Certified authentic and original animations, sound effects, and music made by Pyramid Guy (IG: @pyramidguy), aka Kris Kanaly (TW: @kriskanaly). Galactibles™ ©2021 | galactibles.com
